article_title: James Kirby 'made sure everyone was safe before thinking about himself'
sentence: A  friend  of  James  Kirby,  one  of  the  three  British  men  killed  in  Gaza,  has  told  the  BBC  that  seeing  the  suffering  of  the  people  in  Gaza  would  have  "made  him  want  to  do  something  immediately".
